_header: So fresh beauty so much goodliness
_description: An Epistle to his Mistress (associated with Charles d’Orléans) — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy, including ‘So’ anaphora

BLHar682.First Lines:
SO fresshe bewte so moche goodlynesSo skace of grace so large of
                    crewelte…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…ffor me to ioy my sorowis and to hideHow may it be owt sleyng
                    me in payne
